reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly in cooler weather, and appreciate its thick soft material and fleece lining. Moreover, the dress fits well, with one customer noting it accommodates various body types, while another mentions it's perfect for fall events. Additionally, they like its appearance, stretchiness, and sheerness, with one review highlighting it's sexy without being revealing. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and I will order more colors
items.body: Amazing dress Im 5ft 1 and it was a good length hit mid thigh. Im 32/34 DDD and there was good room for the ladies. Not too tight. Very soft and stretchy. I paired it with a black under bust high waist belt, the fleece lined faux translucent tights to make it look like bare legs, and over the knee boots and man....its a good look. I love it. Will order in more colors. Great price! Read more
items.author: Heidi H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hugs every curve ðŸ’•
items.body: Stretchy and hugs every curve! I am 5â€™6, 145 lbs and I have a large chest and this dress fits beautifully. It feels high quality and not see through. I recommend buying your usual size. I am so happy I bought this. I like that you can pull it down for a more modest look or pull up for a shorter more cute and flirty look. The material is not too thin or too thick. I went with the color black, size medium. I like the way it can be dressed down or up. Just get it, girl! Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks snug without feeling snug!
items.body: This is a wonderful fitting long sleeve khaki dress. I love how snug it looks on me without feeling snug. It's comfortable and cozy, but not too thick or heavy. I bought the one with the longer length, which fits me right above my knees. I wore a nice pair of silky and shiny nude pantyhose and a pair of high heeled ankle boots with this form fitting dress, and I felt so feminine and sexy from the moment I put it on. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic fall dress!
items.body: Great for fall or winter. very soft and warm without being bulky. Looks very flattering with boots and a belt. Form fitting. Read more
items.author: Shelly Bean

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars good purchase
items.body: Looked very hot on my wife Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Abosolute must have in every wardrobe
items.body: Absolutely Soft, comfortable and you can dress it up with accessories or dress it casual for the office and it can be layered as well or worn just like it is I will be buying every color available. Read more
items.author: Erika Foster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Absolutely perfect dress to dress down and up depending on what you want. Stretchy but comfortable, not see through, amazing material quality. Absolutely stunning for the value. Fit exactly as says. Material is thick but still thin. Very versatile when it comes to styling. Read more
items.author: Willy Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit differently than pictured in length
items.body: Was looking for a fitted mini dress. This was closer to knee length and loose all over. Found it to run one size too large, size down due to the stretchy fabric. Not a heavy fabric and not sheer in case you needed to know. Cute as pictured, but what arrived didnâ€™t match the advertised picture. Read more
items.author: Nola

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z Khaki, A Navy Blue, A Dark Green, Z Navy Blue, A Wine Red, A Pink, A Purple, Z Hot Pink, A Brown, A Light Green, A Hot Pink, A White, Z Pink, A Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
